document.p: The allows you to use a mobile Internet connection (for example, 3G) as fall-back connection for your Internet access. This means that the will offer you the possibility to switch to the mobile Internet connection when your DSL or Ethernet WAN connection is down.
document.stem: The Mobile card in the Advanced View displays the status of your mobile connection.
document.p: To open the Mobile page, click the Mobile card in the Advanced View .
The Mobile page contains two tabs:
document.li1: Information displays information about the line and the mobile network status.
Configuration allows you to configure you mobile connection according to 's instructions.
